director.name: 达纳·亚当·夏皮罗 Dana Adam Shapiro

this_title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
trans_title: 性别革命之女：达拉斯牛仔啦啦队不为人知的故事
introduction: DAUGHTERS OF THE SEXUAL REVOLUTION is the never-before-told story of Suzanne Mitchell, the fiercely-loyal den mother of the original Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. Seen by many as regressive and exploitative, this diverse sisterhood of small-town "girls next door" became a controversial pop culture phenomenon at the height of the Sexual Revolution, changing the game of football -...
chinese_title: 性别革命之女：达拉斯牛仔啦啦队不为人知的故事
foreign_title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
